level.heading: Availability of other remedies.
level.text: The provisions of this chapter shall not limit the availability of other remedies under the law or other equitable relief whether or not an adequate remedy exists at law.

level.heading: Temporary Addition of Section
level.text: See Historical and Statutory Notes following § 42-3101.

level.heading: Emergency Act Amendments
level.text: For temporary addition of chapter, see notes to § 42-3101.

level.heading: Legislative History of Laws
level.text: For legislative history of D.C. Law 12-194, see Historical and Statutory Notes following § 42-3101.
